overview:
Wrote first line of code at age 9. Won regional Russian programming competition at 15.

Enterprise software developer (J2EE, Oracle). Worked on the electronic data interchange for a large Russian retailer.

Started DukeSoft IT consulting in 2009. Most notably developed the promotion management system for large casinos like MGM Grand and Greektown.

Helped build Mobiety.ru, a marketing research startup. Helped with mobile app, API integration, payment processing and robust dashboard for client reporting.

Accepted to Saint Petersburg Electro-Technical University at the age of 17. Majored in computer science and computer security.
